351a2('dul ba): 'phrul ya ma zung sna tshogs bstan te/ steng gi na mkha' la 'dug nas tshe'i 'du byed dang srog gi 'du byed btang ste/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das so// de nas dge slong de dag gis gnas brtan dga' ba'i bshes gnyen la
351a3('dul ba): lus bsregs nus mchod rten byas te/ dri dang / me tog dang / spos dang / mar me dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis mchod par byas so// rnam pa 'di dag 'phags pa nas 'phags par brgyud nas
351a4('dul ba): bshad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag gang yin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro snyam nas dga' ba rab tu bskyed pa'i phyir rtogs pa brjod pa 'di 'phags
351a5('dul ba): pa dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bshad do// 'phags pa dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rtogs pa brjod pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po a dze ta shrI b+ha dra dang / dge slong shAkya
351a6('dul ba): 'od kyis bsgyur// gzhon du ma bdun gyi rtogs brjod gsang 'a byin gyis mdza pa zugs so// @#// rgya gar skod du/ sab+ha ku mA rI kA ba dA naM/ bod skad du/ gzhon nu ma bdun gyi rtogs pa brjod pa/ dkon mchog
351b1('dul ba): gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// chags bral ldan dang legs par bshad pa dang // ngo mtshar dang ni de nyid don des dang // dam pa rnams kyi gcig tu mnyan bya yi// rtogs pa brjod pa bdag gis bshad kyis nyon// 'di ltar dge ba'i
351b2('dul ba): rtsa ba yongasasu smin pa rnams la nI longs spyod chen po 'am/ lang tshos bar du gcod par mi 'gyur bas mdzes par gyur pa yin no// de yang 'di ltar rjes su thos te/ rgyal po kri ki zhes bya ba tshul dang dul ba la stsogs pa
351b3('dul ba): yon tan gyi dpal phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la dad pa yang dag par thob pa zhig byung bar gyur pa de/ de'i bu mo bdun sngon du byung ba'i sangs
351b4('dul ba): rgyurgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya cher bskrun pa'i stobs dang ldan pa de dag 'khor byas shin tu yid byung bar gyur nas/ de rnams kyis dul ba dang zhe sar bcas pas pha la phyag byas te snyan pa'i tshig gis smras pa/
351b5('dul ba): 'jig rten gnas pa chu nang song ba'i zla ba'i gzugs bzhin g.yo bar mthong // 'dod pa khros pa'i sbrul gyis lus skyil gdengs kwa'i grib ma lta bur mthong // 'gro bu 'di dag sdug bsngal me yis kun tu 'bar ba mthong bas
351b6('dul ba): na// rgyal po bdag cag nges par 'byung la mngon dga' dur khrod dag tu mchi// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod ni byis pa po de la bsten 'os shing // yid la bsams pa'i don yang mi byas ni// dka' thub gnas su khyed rnams
352a1('dul ba): song zhig ces// ji lta bur na nga yis smra bar nus// bu mos smras pa/ sa bdag khyed kyi mdzad spyod bdag cag rnams kyis 'tshal lags te// 'gro la thugs rje brlan cing nges pa'i ngang tshul ldan pA sa ni//
352a2('dul ba): dgos pa med la'ang byams par mdzad na nyid kyi phung par ni// rnam bskyed sdig med nye ro son bdag cag rnams lta smos ci 'tshal// khyed dang lhan cig gnas kyang dbang med bral ba mngon phyogs pa'i// phongs pa 'di yis
352a3('dul ba): phyir zhing nye bar gdung bar ma gyur ces// rgyal po shin tu dga' ba'i gnas su gyur pa gang dag yin pa yi// zhi bo'i go 'phang thob par 'tshal ba'i yid ni skyes par gyur// de nas rgyal po de snying brtse ba'i dbang gis yid rnam
352a4('dul ba): por nyams shing / mig gnyis zangs ltar da mAr la mi 'gyur bas yang dang yang du bltas nas smras pa/ ci phyir khang bzangs rang dgar gyur dang 'jam yangs pa'o// sna tshogs stan bzangs rgya chen rnam par spangs nas
352a5('dul ba): ni// dur khrod mi bzung skye bo dran pa'i yid 'dra zhing // sa gzhi rus pa dkar po'i tshal pas bkram par brten// gdung ba'i gdong can pa drang yul rmugs lta bur ni// mchi ma'i gdong can ma yang cig ca ra ji ltar 'dor//
352a6('dul ba): g.yo med sems kyi rgyun du yid ni brtse ba yi// mdza' bshes spangs nas ci phyir dka' thub bsten par dga'// de nas bu mo de rnams kyis shin tu brtan pa'i yid kyis bsnyems par byas nas smras pa/ pha dang ma dang
352b1('dul ba): mdza' bshes gces pa tha snyad tsam// 'di dag srid par phyir yang lhung dang gnod pa'i gzhi// 'byung ba'i don mthong lkog tu gyur pa'i dri ma yis// mi yIs bdag po 'jig rten 'jig pas yongs su skyo// mdza' bshes rang
352b2('dul ba): mi gnyen gyi ngo bo sna tshogs pa// g.yon can phung khros ldan pa 'di la su zhig chags// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten rmi lam mig 'phrul dang 'dra la// 'di na su zhig gang gis rang mi 'am skye bor brtag/ mi yi dbang po 'jig rten
352b3('dul ba): dam chos gsung gi 'od zer snang bcas shing // ji srid sangs rgyas nyi ma'i yid blod grags pas 'od zer phreng yod pa// de srid phongs pa'i mun nag tshogs kyis shin tu g.yogs gyur pa'i// srid pa'i mun pa mi zad mun
352b4('dul ba): rum nas ni 'byung bar bya ba'i rigs// ji ltar rlung gis brdabs pas bskyod pa'i ma lce 'bar ba'i khyim las ni// 'byung bar byed pa'i skyes bu de la phan par 'dod rnams zlog mi byed// de bzhin sdug bsngal ma chen rtser gnas/
352b5('dul ba): srid pa ma lus gnod pa yis// dra ba las nI d+hes par 'byung la phan phyir dam pas zlog mi bya// de nas rgyalnga po de sA bu mo de rnams mdza' bshes dang rang mi dang rtsa lag rnam la bltos pa med pa'i tshig rtsub po dang / rang gi
352b6('dul ba): lus dang srog la yang shin tu ma chags pa'i tshig gis lhag par yong mya ngan gyis gdungs par gyur pa'i yid kyis de rnams la yang smras pa/ dus min dka' thub mngon par 'dod pa ni// yid dang rjes mthun don du
353a1('dul ba): mi 'gyur te// bu mo dus min mngal dang ldan pa la// yan lag cha shas mdzes pa mi skye bzhin// dus la bab par dka' thub la sbyor ba// zla ba skyon dang bral ba lta bur mdzes// de bas gzhon nus phan
353a2('dul ba): med blo 'gyur 'di'i// log pa'i lam du 'jug las bzlog par gyis// bde la brten cing sdug bsngal ma mthong bas// lus kyis sdug bsngal bzod par mi 'gyur te// a mra'i shing na rtsa ba ma zug la// glang chen mchog gi mche ba
353a3('dul ba): bsnun dang mtshungs// khong nas me 'bar ltas ngan sgra 'byin pa'i// lce spyang 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs tshang tshing gang // 'jigs pa rnams kyang 'jig par byed pa yi// mi bzang dur khrod dag ni 'jigs par bcas// khyed lus
353a4('dul ba): pad+ma 'i rtswa ltar 'jam pa la// sems gang sog les lta bur brtse med 'des// gzhan gyi ngor byed pa ni spong gyur pa// e ma ho ga na ma bskos bdag la brtse med sdang // bai DUr+ya ltar sngo ljang rung ba'i gos gyon cing // me tog rnam
353a5('dul ba): pa du ma'i tshogs ni bkram gyur dang // bung ba myos pa'i tshogs kyis khyab pa'i rtsed mo'i tshal// 'di ni bu mo khyed rnams mngon par dga' bar gyis// skyed mos tshal na rdzing khong ngogs na me tog shing 'phyang zhing // rlung gi chu/
353a6('dul ba): rlabs mdzes pa'i phreng bas skra rags bcings// pad+ma dag dang ut+pal rgyas gseb dang pa sgra sgrogs pa// brgya byin gyis kyang rnyed dka' bu mo dga' bos gnas par gyis// me tog na pa ma li ka'i dris bsgos gyur pa yi//
353b1('dul ba): chu rlabs mdzes par gyur pa'i nye bar g.yo ba yi// rlung dang bcas pa'i khyim 'di dang ni nags tshal ni// khu byug sgra 'byin pa yi bu mo dga' bar gyis// skar khung dra ba can nang bya rnams skad 'byin me tog dris bsgos dang //
353b2('dul ba): sgresgrogs pas khrus byas drodri zhim bsgos pa'i nags dang 'dra ba'i rlung dag ni// khang bzangs mda' yab can dang bya gage bde bar nyal ba gang yin 'dir// bud med 'dus pa'i glu dbyangs rol mo ldan par khyed rnams dga' bar
353b3('dul ba): gyis// de nas gzhon nu ma de rnams pha'i tshig nges yid ma rangs par gyur nas smras pa/ mi yi bdag po lha yul sa steng na// brgya phrag stong du spyad pa ma byas pa'i// bde ba gzhan drag ci yang yod min te// bdag cag rnams
353b4('dul ba): ni don med mkhas pa yi nA// yul la lhags par sred cing goms pas na// dbang po rnams ni yul gyis ngoms pa med// srid pas 'jigs po'i rtag par blo can dag/ srid pa'i longs spyad zad par bya phyir 'jug/
353b5('dul ba): ngo bo nyid kyis 'gyur zhing mi brtan la// rlung gis bskyod pa'i chu rlabs ltar 'jig pas// sdom can dbang po drug las rnam rgyal rnams// phyir zhing srid par 'jug las ldog par byed// byis pa srid pa'i btson rar phrag/
353b6('dul ba): phag lta bur// sems kyi sbags pa'i spyod pas bslus gyur te// bde bar mngon par rlom zhing brkam pa dag/ 'phangs shing 'jigs pa'i g.yang sa mtha' med lhung // bdag tu rtog pas sems g.yengs skyes gyur pa// de ni
354a1('dul ba): rab 'bar mtshon cha'i 'khrul 'khor 'dra// yul la rjes su brten pas sems bcom pa// yongs su smin na sdug bsngal mi bzang rgyu// 'gro ba 'di dag mi brtan dbang med cing // sbrul gdug mtsho/
354a2('dul ba): gyis zin 'dra'i yul rnams dag/ rtogs kyang grang zhig srid la chags gyur pa// de ni mi yi gzugs ldan phyugs nyid yin// rnga rtsid shing li thogs pa'i g.yag bzhin du// blo ya lam ni rnyog pas nyer 'gags shing // log
354a3('dul ba): par chags pa'i yal gas sems thogs pa'i// skyes bu ngan pa'i khyim bsten phung bar 'gyur// dga' bo'i rgyu tsam 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten la// phongs pa rgyan mi 'chad par 'byung 'gyur na// yab cig srid pa'i dga' ba mang po
354a4('dul ba): las/ slu bar mi 'gyur gang zhig mchis par gsungs// mi dbang srid na bskul pa mnyam pa yis// nye bar bsgrubs shing bsags par gyur kyang ni// bcom zhing sems ni dman pa dman pa yis// srid pa'i dgon pa
354a5('dul ba): gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur// rgyal po rgyar chud gyur pa'i nya bzhin du// skyes bu legs par brtags shing byed pa dang // tha snyad kun la ngang gis mkhas pa yang // khyim gyi brtson rang gnas na 'jigs par 'gyur// sA yi
354a6('dul ba): bdag po 'bad pa mang po yis// khyimo du rdzas rnams bsags pa byas pa dag/ mi yis skad cig gis ni 'dor 'gyur te// legs bshad gcig pu 'di nyid lam du bstan// de bas 'jig rten mgon pos 'tsho ba yi//
354b1('dul ba): 'jig rten mi rnams las bdag byar gsungs te// 'chi ba mngon phyogs mi la rang gi las// ba la be'u bzhin du rjes su 'brangs// yongasu gyur nu mi bzang gnyen sdug dang // sdug dang 'dre bar mngon pas 'dod des cho ga/ sdug
354b2('dul ba): dang phrad pas dga' bar sems po dag/ nges par sdug dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal 'thob// mi dbang gzhan yang ngang gis mthar 'jig pa'o// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten de ga na sdug pa su// dam pa'i don la rnam dpyod mkhas pa
354b3('dul ba): yang // sdug ces bya ba 'di blo rnam par g.yengs// sa bdag khyed ni gali te bdag cag la// sdug pa 'ga' zhig mchis na bdag cag rnams// ma smad 'phags pas bsten cing mi 'phrogs pa'i// bde ba yid la 'dod pa
354b4('dul ba): sgrub tu ga sol// de nas rgyal po de brtse ba'i yid ma rangs par gyur kyang / bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mngon par dad byas chos la bar chad byed pa'i 'jigs pa skyes pa dang / rang gi bu mo rnams kyis sngon gyi
354b5('dul ba): skye ba rjes su d+hun+da te 'gro bar 'dod pas na skye ba dran pas nyes so snyam du bsams te/ shin tu yun ring por cang mi smra bar gyur to// mi yi skyes bu de yis ni// 'ching ba med por shes pas na/ song bas yongs su ma
354b6('dul ba): spangs par// ci zhig ltar ni rjes snang smras// de nas bu mo de rnams kyis me tog phreng ba dang byug pa dang rgyan rnams spa rings nas/ dul ba dang ldan par zhugs pa'i lus la gos dkar po phra zhing rab tu 'phyang ba gyon pas
355a1('dul ba): chu bo rlung gi shugs kyis bskyod pa'i dbu ba'i phreng ba lta bu 'am/ ston ka'i mtshan mo zla ba'i 'od kyi gos kyis bkab pa lta bu 'am/ drang srong smre bdun gyi skar mu rang gi 'od zer gyi dra bas g.yogs pa
355a2('dul ba): lta bu dang / rim gyis ro bsregs pa'i gnas me'i dbus su ro bzhag pa cil cil zer ba rnam par bkram pa dang / ro rnam par mnam pa dri mi zhim cing 'jigs su rung ba dang / mi'i thod pa bya rgod kyi mchu'i rtse mo rnon pos
355a3('dul ba): brtol ba'i bu ga nas klad pa dang chu ser rnam par 'dzag pas mi ro'i gdong la sbags pas mtha' ma khyab cing 'jigs pa dang / rnyings shing dengs la mdog rnam par 'gyurarA pa'i rus pa dum bu'i tshogs kyis non cing rtsub pas
355a4('dul ba): sa'i phyogs rnams bgrod par dka' ba dang / lus can dag yongasu yid 'byung bar byed pa gshin rje'i gnas bzhin mya ngan dang yid mi bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'i gnas su gyur pa'i dur khrod du phyin par gyur to//
355a5('dul ba): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi'i khrag dag zhag gis dri mi zhim pas myos par gyur pa'i bya rgod dang // rgyu lto nar byas khyab cing mi sdug 'jigs pa'i ro ye yan leg rnams kyis khebs// kun dang 'dre bar dkar zhing rtog tu
355a6('dul ba): dgod pa 'dra bar mtha' gas thod pa dang // n+ya gro d+ha rnying sul nas 'ug po sna tshogs hUM sgrogs 'jigs pa'i dur khrod phyin// lce spyang khi ni mer bcas brlang ba'i sgra dag sgrogs pas 'jigs pa dang // la lar thod pa dkar po'i
355b1('dul ba): dru bas khyab cing bgrod dka' dang // srin bu rigs kyi tshogs kyis gzings shing rna khung bskyod pa dang // bung ba sbrang bu brgya phrag mang po ro la 'phungs shing 'du// rus pa dkar dang dmar rlon rlung gi sna bskyod par gyur pa dang //
355b2('dul ba): ro bsregs me gsal 'phro dang shing skam rtsa na sbrul nyal dang // la lar mi yi lus ni mdung rnos phug nas bskyon pa drag/ gshin rje rtag tu dga' ston byed la 'jug pa'i tshang byung 'dra// la ltar mi mgo'i thod pa'i gseb
355b3('dul ba): nas khrag dang chu ser 'dzag pa yi// khu ba mi sdug de ga la sred pa'i shra za'i tshogs kyis khyab// la laR+Ya tsi la cil zer ba'i ro bsreg me yis bskor ba dring // mi ro'i khang nas rgyu long phyung ba gtor bas khyab par gyur// skyo bas
355b4('dul ba): brlan pa'i sems kyis ni// der ni bud med dedrer brtags nas// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten rgyu mi rgyu'o// ngo bo nyid ni sems par gyur// sgra yi snying ni rdul gyis rtsub cing dra marA// mig sbub sa bya yi mchu dang sder mos brus// gsang gnas
355b5('dul ba): 'gyur zhing mi sdug rnag bcas par// bor ba'i bud med lus der rab tu bltas// dam pa'i spyod pa thang cig nyer g.yos shing // ut+pal 'dab ltar dkyu sa ring mig gis ni// ro yi gzeb de mngon par bltas nas kyang // tshig mang/
355b6('dul ba): rnam pa du ma smis par gyur// 'di nyid rdo thal byugs pas dga' ba'i gnas khang ni// zla zer gsal bas spras par byas pa ru// sdug pa'i phangs par brten cing gnas pa las// de ni sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi la nyal// sdug
356a1('dul ba): pa'i lag pa'i gzeb tu nyal ba na// 'brug sgra sgrogs pa yis ni khyod skrag na// mer bcas ltas ngan lce spyang sgra yis ni// dka' thub ma khyod ci phyir 'dir mi 'jigs// 'di nyid rang gi khyim 'khor zla zer de//
356a2('dul ba): ro smad lci ba'i khur gyis dral 'gro la// rol cing dgod la sgeg par rnam lta la// brtse med bya rnams da ltar za bar byed// 'gro ba 'di dag ngan cing mi brtan to// snying rje med pa'i sdug de ci yi phyir// mi ro brgya yis khyab par gyur pa
356a3('dul ba): yi 'i dur khrod 'di ru khyod ni bor bar 'gyur// rang mi rtsa lag mdza' bshes sdug pa dang // pad+mar bung ba bzhin du gnas pa las// ci phyir mtshan mos rgyu bas 'jigs kyang ni// nyon mongs deng 'dir duru khrod dag tu dga'// sngon ni
356a4('dul ba): mdzes shing snum la dkyus ring 'jam pa'i mig gi lta ba na// chags can rnams kyis mig 'byas mtha' dmar 'gyur zhing mi rnams nyams byed pa// 'dod lha'i ri dwags rgyar gyur bud med de nyid deng ni bya rnams kyis// mig phyung
356a5('dul ba): sdug bsngal 'i byas pas chags dang bcas rnams shin tu 'jigs par byed// mi gtsang sna tshogs khong na mi mngon srog shing gi/ lus la bdag gir chags pas longs pa'i mi bslus zhes// bud med mchog 'di 'dod tshogs
356a6('dul ba): ldi na pa rnams la ni// brkam pa'i bya yis mchu gtogs gdong gis nye bar dgod// pi wang gling bu'i sgra snyan rnams dang snyan pa'i glu gar bcas// mchog tu sdug pa'i pang na bag phab bde bar gnyid log pa'i// bud med de ni
356b1('dul ba): lce spang skad 'byin mu cor skra bcas shing // sa rdul gyis khyab rtsub pa'i dur khrod 'dir deng nyal bar gyur// gang du rnam par brtags kyang skra yi rtse mo tsam gyis ni// gtsang ba mi gtsang tshogs kyis tshang 'dir mi snang na// phung
356b2('dul ba): khyokhyil chos can nad mang 'a dod pa tha chad pa// rang bzhin ngan rnams ci phyir de ni chags par gyur// bu mo 'gro ba kun gyi tshul yang 'di 'dra bas// rmi lam mig 'phrul chu zla lta bur rang bzhin gyis// g.yo ba rtogs pa ji srid/
356b3('dul ba): srog ni lhag ma dang // bcas shing lus bzhin gyur tshe chags dang nyer bral byos// gshin rje'i chu srin dga' ba'i khar ni chung gyur cing // sku dkar tshogs kyi spyi nas bzung nas ni// srog mthar gyur pa'i gnod pa'i tsher ma'i gnad
356b4('dul ba): phug la// mchi mas mig khebs gyur tshe dge ba ji ltar bya// 'jig rten pha rol mi bzang mun nag g.yang chen du// lhung zhing lus byer gyur tshe dge ba 'dod gyu ra pa// dug can sbrul kha dog pa'i nang du chud gyur pa'i// sprul pa nga ro/
356b5('dul ba): 'don dang mtshungs zhes mkhas rnams smra// ci phyir tshig rtsub phra ma ma 'brel spyi brtol smra ba dang // snyan tshig bcos sam 'jig rten bslus par gyur nas de ring ni// mi smra gnas zhes spyod pa lta bus mdun so'i phrag nas
356b6('dul ba): ni/ bya rnams tsham chom med par mchu yi skams pas lce yang 'byin par 'gyur// chags pas mdong shing logs pa'i yul goms yon po'i bsam pa can// byis pa gang gis mig gis yul mthong brtan pa rnam 'jig pa'i// /
357a1('dul ba): mdzes pa'i ro spyad de ni de ring 'jigs dang bral ba yi// mI bzang bya rgod mchu dang sder mor 'jog cing tshul du 'dri// gang dag rang gi khang pa sa gzhi me tog sil mas gtor bA yi// rtsig pa'i ri mo
357a2('dul ba): yongs 'gyur bzhin dang zur gyis lta byed cing // sdug pa'i lag pa'i pad+mar rten cing dal gyis 'gro ba yaM se// bud med de yi rkang pa der ni wa dug zla bar 'gyur// 'di ltar lhan cig skyes pa'i mi sdug mi gtsang 'dam rtsub
357a3('dul ba): dang 'dregs pas myos shing sems lcong gyur pas sdug bsngal nyon mongs pa'i// lus la khyod kyis 'di ni rang bzhin ma zhir bltas nas ni// 'tshe ba'i 'jig rten glog ltar rab tu 'jig la'ang yid byung gis// yang dag rdo bzhin
357a4('dul ba): thugs chung chos kyi rgyal pos sems can+da rnams// nyon mongs rma nang rgyun mi 'chad par 'dzag par gdung ba la// rang bzhin bsil ba'i chos gsung rgyu yi bum pas ma mdzad pa// sman pa'i mchog gyur ston pa de la
357a5('dul ba): rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo// shes par dka' zhing g.yon can ma zhi lus drang nyon mongs ldan// rnam par 'gyur la mA zhi skye bar bshad pa gang yin pas// rmongs pa shing rta'i 'phyang lo bzhin du dbang med 'khor// 'jig rten
357a6('dul ba): mi bzod 'phongs pa'i rdo rjes lus ni nges 'joms 'gyur// gzhon nu'i tshe na ma yis len bur ldan pa'i sgra byas shing // gang la lang tsho mdzes pa'i nor bu'i phreng ba mchag bcings dang // bram ze me tog bcas pa'i shi ba'i
357b1('dul ba): chu thigs kyis gtor ba'i// bud med mgo lnga mi bzang khwa rnams thogs pas nyon mongs so// gang zhig bag ma'i dus su me tog bzang bsgos shing // ma yi lag pas dge mtshan bkra shis byas gyur pa'i// s+tha de de rnying rab drag
357b2('dul ba): rlung gis bskyod nas ni// dur khrod dag gi shing la rnga yab nyid du gyur// rang bzhin sbyin par lta dang zur gyis lta gang song // sgeg pa'i goms stabs dang ni dregs myos gang du song // dga' bas btag cing glu dang dgod pa gung du
357b3('dul ba): saso nga // e mo sgyu ma'i gsang ba'i rab bkod ngo mtshar che// dgod cing dal gyis rnam g.yo'i rna rgyan 'od kyis 'khur ba dmar po dang // gang du srog dang mnyam pa'i mdzes pa'i ri mo 'brad de bris pa dang // pad+ma gzhon nu'i snying po
357b4('dul ba): lta bu 'jam pa po'i 'khur chos gang yin dwer// bya rnams dpral bar gnas shing khrag gis sgrogs pa'i mchu yis 'chog par byed// 'od can mu tig phreng ba'i lbu ba dkar zhing ba spu'i chu bal can// nu ma rgyas pa'i ngur pa zur
357b5('dul ba): ldan brang gI rdzi mchog yangs pa dag/ g.yo ba'i gos lhung byas pas phongs pa'i mig ni gang du chags gyur pa// der ni rnam par gnags pas sbrang bu'i tshogs rnams 'phungs par gyur// sngon ni tsun don chu thigs phyung
357b6('dul ba): gtor tA la'i lo ma rlung yab dang // mngag gzhug rnams dang bzang mo'i gdu bu'i sgrar ldan pa dag g.yog byed cing // khang bzangs zla zer gyis spras dkar bas mdzes pa'i sngas ni rten gyur pa// de ni ngang 'dir khA yi sgra
358a1('dul ba): gshog rtsub pas bskyod pa'i rlung gis g.yob par gyur// gang gis sngon ni 'di bskyod cing // gseb nang dag tu gnas bcas nas// lus kyi shing ni spangs nas ni// sems kyi spre'u de gang du seng //
358a2('dul ba): gang gis byed pa med 'di yang // byed pa lta bur ston byed pa// bdag med ro 'di spangs nas su// sems kyi bzhad gang mkhan gang song // gang zhig rmongs pas blo mdengs pas// nang na bdag tu 'dogs gyur cing // mu stegs can
358a3('dul ba): rnams rmongs byed pa'i// rnam shes srin po dri gang song // gang gis yun ring rnam blangs kyang // yang dag par ni mi gnas pas// sna tshogs sems kyis sgyu ma mkhan// 'gro ba 'di las gang du song // bdag gi 'gro ba ser sgyu sogs
358a4('dul ba): dka' thub pas kyang mi shes pas// na mkha'i yul gyi spyod yul cam// sems kyi rig 'dzin de gang song // g.yo dang mi g.yo'i sgo dgu po// mi gtsang 'di ni spyod spyod pa// de nas lus kyi gzeb 'dri las// sems kyi bya de gong du/
358a5('dul ba): song // mi bzang sul las sdug bsngal 'bab pa'i la na tshwa chen pos rab tu khengs gyur pa'i// srid pa'i rgya mtsho nyon mongs sbrul dang nyar 'gre gang yin der chud tsong // mi shes chu srin 'khrug pa'i chu rlabs g.yo ba'i chu bor
358a6('dul ba): nub gyur pa// sems kyi mchin mo spyod pa lus 'di spangs nas de ring gang du song // nye bral bcom ldan de ni gdul ba'i thabs rnams gang dag yin mkhyen gyi// ma dul gang gis mthar ni dmyal bar me 'bar 'phro bar gyur
358b1('dul ba): pa yi/ gser ltar ser ba'i gseb tu dbang med par ni 'dor byed pa// rang bzhin g.yo bar byed pa'i sems kyi rta de di ring gang du song // de nas rdo rje'i 'od kyis 'khrig ma rgyas ltung ba// brgya byin dga' bas myig gdangs dul bcas
358b2('dul ba): nyer song ste// bu mo rnams la rang bzhin skul bzang tshig gis ni// rjes su mthun zhing dge bas legs so legs zhes smras// sring mo na tshod gzhan zhing 'drod lha'i gnas gyur dang // rgyal rigs 'byor pa'i dpal gyis byed ba spangs
358b3('dul ba): nas ni/ sngon gyi drang srong rnams kyi dka' la zhugs gyur pa// dka' thub 'das bdag yongs dga' khyed rnams ci 'dod smos// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug lag mthil gnas bzhin shes par gyis// sum cu rtsa gsum bdag po'i bde ba'ang
358b4('dul ba): des rtogs la// lha rgyal brgya byin bdag yin khyod nyid gang 'dod dang // sring mo bdag gis nges par gang bya myurar+ya du smos// de nas gzhon nu de rnams yul gyi bde la 'dod med cing // rang bzhin g.yo meng sems kyis brgya byin zur
358b5('dul ba): mig gis bltas nas// rang gi drag pa yongasu smin pa brtan pa'i rang bzhin gyis// kha na ma tho mang gsal sna chog sa don ldan tshig 'di smras// brgya byin bdag cag skye ba'i sdug bsngal gyis ni gdungs gyur pa'i// srid pa'i bde
358b6('dul ba): ba'i zil pa'i kha chu 'dzags pa'i rgyu 'dra'i phyir// bzhin ras mdzes pa mya ngan mchi mas bris shing rnyog pa yi// gnyen rnams spangs nas dka' thub 'di la rjes su zhugs pa min// gzhan yang 'gro ba ma lus tshul ngan gyis
359a1('dul ba): bcings mi bzad pa// 'phongs pa brgya phrag stong gis bcom pas nges par skyo gyur cing // bkren pas nyam thag mthong bas nyes zung rnams kyis rjes 'brangs te// rga med mya ngan med pa'i go 'phang
359a2('dul ba): thob phyir brtson pa yin// gal te 'gro la rjes brtse lhag bsom dang tshul ldan gyur cing // ci ste brgyabyin khyod kyis mchog ni yang dag ster nus na// 'chi ming mi phrogs tshangs zhi tshangs pa'i go 'phangs rnam grol te// sred
359a3('dul ba): pa'i 'jigs pas yongs gdung bdag cag rnams kyis thob par mdzod// lus las byung zhing 'dzag pa'i dri ma skyon gyis bsgos par gnas pa dang // ma yi mngal du mI gtsang 'dam gyi tshogs na yang ma spangs spyod// byung
359a4('dul ba): nanu rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi ni mgo brtsir brgyal zhing nyam thag pas// nyon mongs sdug bsngal gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i skye ba bcad par mdzod// rga ba'i srin mos skra dkar mche ba dkar po myu gu ldan pa
359a5('dul ba): yikha gdangs nas ni 'gro la gzhung lugs med par sme nas 'dzin byed cing // gang 'di mi yi brtson dran blo gros dga' ba'i dpal ni rab 'joms pa// lha yi dbang po khyod kyis gal te nus na de las bskyab par mdzog/
359a6('dul ba): dbugs rgod g.yo zhing lto ba sra la pags pa skya zhing rtsub pa dang // longs spyod 'bar ba sna tshogs thob kyang spyod par mi nus stobs med pa// gang gis lus zin 'chi bdag pho nya'i skyes bu nad tshogs rab 'jigs pa//
359b1('dul ba): lha dbang khyod ni ci ste mchog sbyin 'dod na de las bdag cag skyobs// mig ni phyir phyogs gyur mi g.yo nang rnams gcod pas sdug bsngal ba// nyon mongs 'khrul pas rab tu lus bcom 'jigs pas phung po 'gyel
359b2('dul ba): bA dang // gnyen rnams mthong bas mchi mas 'khur pa dag dang mchu ni bkrus gyur pa// gang gis zin na rab tu 'jigs 'gyur bcing ba de las bdag cag srungs// gang gis yang khyab gyur na phyugs bzhin 'gyur
359b3('dul ba): zhing mya ngan gyis zin la// bya dang mi bya'i rnam pa blo la mi sems smad pa'i gnad bskyed pa// tha mal bsil ba'i 'thor ba'i rlung gis g.yabs kyang lus tshim mi 'gyur ba'i// 'dod chags me chen de ni mchog sbyin
359b4('dul ba): khyod kyis nges par zhi bar mdzod// gang gi shugs kyis mig 'gyur g.yo zhing so yi sgro gnon la// skad cig gis kyang mi bzed dmyal ba'i 'bras bu ster byed sdig can ni// dengs pa'i lo ma drang ni chu dag za ba'i thub rnams
359b5('dul ba): kyis kyang ma bton pa'i// yid kyi sul gnas khro ba'i sbrul de brgya byin khyod kyis bskul bar mdzod// gang gis myig khebs gyur na blo gros ngan rnams zhi bo'i lam spong zhing // log ltalha'i dug gis nye bar spags pa'i
359b6('dul ba): yid kyis lam gzhan dag la brten// gang zhig rab rib bsal bas zag pa kun gyi rgyur ni rab gsungs pa// log yid khyim na spyod pa rmongs pa'i mun pa'i mun nag brgya byin khyod kyis gsol// brgya byin mchog ni
360a1('dul ba): de dag rnams// khyod la bdag cag rnams slong gis// dam bcas don las 'gal ba ni// mkhas pas 'dod par mi byed do// de nas brgya byin gyis de rnams 'dod pa'i yul dge slong bar mi byed cing
360a2('dul ba): ltos pa med la gsal zhing mdzes pa'i tshig gis rnam par 'phrul pas ngo mtshar du gyur cing yang dag par dad pas lus kyi spu zing zhes byed de/ smras pa/ mi 'byor dngos po slong bar gyur pa ni// 'jig rten dag na bro zhing
360a3('dul ba): zhum gyur pas// gang 'dri bdag gis sbyin par nus pa yi// mchog rnams sbyin gyis bu mo khyed kyis smros// de nas bu mo de rnams kyis de'i nang na ma ngon pa'i rgyus rnam par smras pa'i tshig des yang dag par skyo bas nye bar
360a4('dul ba): bskyed pa'i khro bas brgya byin la smras pa/ ci phyir nye bar 'drid pa'i thabs dang ni// brgya byin 'dzem med de dgra gang du lhags// bde ba tsam dang mi mkhas blo can ne ma// mi bsrun pa yi bgrod bya bdag cag min// 'dir ni phyogs
360a5('dul ba): rnams rgya cher grags pa'i tshogs ldan pa'i// rgyal po'i rigs su gyur par khyod kyis mi shes sam// gang gis nor gyis snying po nges par bltas nas ni// nor bdag ming yang ji bzhin don dang ldan pa yi// rga bas gzi cing
360a6('dul ba): 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal gyis// dub cing yid 'byung zhum pa'i 'jigs spang phyir// lha yi mgon po gnas skabs 'dir zhugs kyis// dregs pas ma yin byis min mi brtan min// bsod nams byed pa rnams la 'tshe ba'i phyir
360b1('dul ba): gang phyir khyed ko bdag cag sdug bsngal byed// gnyen dang mdza' bshes 'khor gyi sbyor ba yi// dga' bas brgya byin yun ring 'tsho ba gyis// rang byas mgo skal ldan pa'i 'bar ba yi// glang phyir lha yi bdag por khyod
360b2('dul ba): gyur des// gzhan gtsos rgyu yis lha yi rgyal po yi// dam pa'i phun sum tshogs thob mi 'gyur ro// de nas dbang po chen po des de'i tshig gsal zhing tshig gi don sna tshogs ston pa'i tshig rnams kyis lus tshim zhing //
360b3('dul ba): mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur la dad pas bzhin rab tu dang zhing mdzes pa dang / gzhan yang de rnams kyis bsam pa sad pa'i phyir shin tu bsti stang dang bcas pa'i tshig gis smras pa/ kye ma mu dang 'dra ba'i sring mo dag
360b4('dul ba): 'jig rten dka' thub can+d+ra dag kyang // mgon du bdag ni lta 'dod na// ci phyir 'di ltar mchog ster bA// nga la khyad rnams brtse med 'gyur// de nas bu mo de rnams lhag par yang 'khru rigs shing khro bo dang bcas brgya byin
360b5('dul ba): la smras pa// bde sogs kyis ni bzhin ras+t+ra la// 'chags shing 'dzum dang zur mig gis// rnam lta'i gnas ni gzhan yin zhing // sbyin bya'i mchog kyang gzhan yin no// gal te brgya byin khyod kyis ni// mchog rab ste R+sha bar
360b6('dul ba): nus na ni// yul rnams kyi ni sha za ni// mi srun de las rgyal bar gyis// yang na 'dod pas spang dka' zhing // log pa'i rtogs pas chags gyur na// rgyun de nyid la rtag tu gnas// gal te nus yod 'di 'drar gyis// mi/
361a1('dul ba): stong ldan khyod mi brtun pa'i// 'drod la yid ni chags gyur pa// khyod ni sbyin bya thu dang na// mchog ces pa ni ji ltar smra// ji ltar chu bo 'jigs pa yi// shugs kyis bdas par gyur pa'i mi// gzhan
361a2('dul ba): dag bsgral bar bya'o zhes// yongs rtogs byed pa'i rmongs pa'i gnas// sgra rnams bregs par gyur nas nI// phyag dar khyod kyi gos 'phang zhing // dgon pa yul du 'dod par ni// na mu zhig de ltar 'gyur zhig gu/ gnya'
361a3('dul ba): shrIng gang tsam rnam blta zhing // sa yi lhung bzed lag thogs nas// dpyad med khyim nas khyim du ni// nam zhig slong mo spyod par gyur// rnyed dang bkur sti chags med cing // nyon mongs tsher ma'i 'dam rdzib dwag/ sbyar bu byed
361a4('dul ba): cing grong khyer gyis// sbyin pa'i gnas su nam zhig 'gyur/ rtsa yi tshogs las longs nas ni// ba mos lci ba'i gos dag dang // zas skom dran ngon tsam gang gis// namA zhig lus la chags med 'gyur// shing d+ha da ne tswi ltar
361a5('dul ba): ljang ba'i// ngur pa 'dzum po'i gos can du// mthong chos bde ba'i dga' ston dang // namya zhig bdag ni nyal bar 'gyur// 'dor bar 'gyur ba'i lus srog la// chu dang rtsa yi zil pa ltar// ltos med yun ring goms pa yi//
361a6('dul ba): bde ba chen po nam zhig 'thob// nam zhig chu ngogs sman ljongs su// gnas nas chu ngogs 'byung 'jigs dang // 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten gnas 'dra bar// yang dang yang du lta bar 'gyur// lta ba kun gyi mar gyur pa'i// 'jig
361b1('dul ba): tshogs lta ba 'byin pa dang // srid pa'i longs spyod mi 'dod par// bdag ni nam zhig 'gyur zhig gu/ rmi lam smyig rgyu sgyu ma sbyin// dri zla'i grong khyer mtshungs par ni// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten dag/ namu zhig rtogs par byed par//
361b2('dul ba): 'gyur/ ming po 'di ltar dga' ba yi// re ba'i yi da kyi rnam rol pas// zang zing bcas shing g.yo ba yi// mchog de rnams kyis ci zhig bgyi// kye ma mchog rab sbyin par sems gzhan yang // log par rtog pa skad cig
361b3('dul ba): tsam 'ga' zhig/ lha mgon 'dod pa ngo bo nyid kyi g.yo// g.yang sa chen po mun nag bcas 'dra bas// sums rgya che ba'i dam pas rnam par smras// ma rig 'tshe ba kun gyi rgyur gyur cing // 'dod pas mi rnams 'khrul par byed pas
361b4('dul ba): na// 'di ni smad bya 'jigs pa chen po ste// mi gtsang bsgos pa'i sbrul nag dog dang mtshungs// gung 'di thog mtha' med nas 'gro ba dang // 'gro bar 'gyur drang gnas bi R+R-i sems can lus// de ni gsod 'joms bsten dang mchu
361b5('dul ba): pus na// sdig pa'i gzhir gyur 'dod pas ci zhig bya// lha dbang brgya byin 'dod pa'i yul 'di ni// phyag dar khrod 'drar byed 'dra'i ngo bo bas// rdzun par rtog cing rnam smin mi bzad pa'i// 'dod pa yid kyis kyang ni su zhig bsten// /
361b6('dul ba): baMbai DUr sngo ldeng skyes pa'i rtsa dang ni// me tog rgyas par gyur pa'i shing gau nags spangs nas// lcags kyu rnon pos spyi bor 'tshog cing 'dri ba dang // glang chen dbang pos khur skyed yul gyis bslus pa yin// mdung rtse lus bskyon
362a1('dul ba): grong gi khra yi tshogs rnams kyi// gshog pa'i rlung gis rab tu g.yobA par byed gyur lnga// mdza' bo rnams kyang g.yo bcas mig gi lta byed par// skyes bu 'jigs par 'gyur ba'ang yul gyis brlag pa
362a2('dul ba): yin/ 'byis pa log rtog rlung gis rab 'bar 'dod pa yis// rang nyid khang pa bdag nyid kyis ni sreg byed na// smin ma lo brgya lon pa phan tshun bdar ba yis// rang nyid kyis ni sreg par byed pa ji bzhin no// brgya byin gzhan yang
362a3('dul ba): rnam rgyal khang par gnas nas ni// 'od 'phro nor bu'i dpal gyis dga' ba 'di las ni// me chen rab 'bar 'jigs pa'i mnar med par phyin pas// gang 'di dug can yul gyi bde ba bde legs min// mtho ris gnas nas
362a4('dul ba): 'gro ba ngan pa'i nang 'jug cing // skad cig gis lhung 'pho ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba// gang dag myong 'gyur lha yi 'jig rten mngon dga' ba// sngar myong gyur pa de ni bde ba myong ma yin// gsar gyi pad+ma kha khyer ngang pa nyal
362a5('dul ba): ba dang / gang 'dir lha'i khang pa rdzing bur gru la brgal ba dag/ 'dod pa'i las kyis slar yang mi ro rul pa yis// gzings pa'i chu bo rab med nang du lhung bar 'gyur// yongs su gyur na dga' bral rmi lam lta bu yi// lha rnams
362a6('dul ba): bde la de ni brgya byin su zhig 'dong // 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten khros pa'i sbrul gyis lce ltar g.yo bar ni// thams cad rtogs pas bdag cag thar la gzhol ba gnas// srid 'gro tshang tshong nang na gnas pa'i bis baM rnams// 'di /
362b1('dul ba): yin zhes pa de log par brtags tsam ste// gang 'di srid pa ma lus sdug bsngal kun bskyed ces// yang dag gsungs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten rang bzhin sdug bsngal mang po g.yeng sna 'gyu/
362b2('dul ba): te/ gang tshe 'di na bde ba myong ba'ang bya rog ta lar mtshungs// de yang phreng gyur sdug bsngal du mas zil gyis gnon 'gyur te// chu bo'i chu ni rgya mtshor phyin pa dag dang mtshungs// gang phyir bu du med ge sar bcas pa'i
362b3('dul ba): pad+ma'i 'dab 'dra dang // gdo bu cung zad khrol ba tsan dan bsil bas bsgos par gyur pa yis// reg cing zangs ltar dmar bcas sor mo zlum pas brtse byas 'khyud par byas pa dong // bsil yab rlung gis rgyun phreng
362b4('dul ba): gtor bas khyab par gnyid log gyur pa dag/ 'jug ma'i rtse mor bcer ba'i lam du thal ba dang 'dres rlung dmar ni// drag pos g.yob cing dub la lci ba'i lus kyi slar yang nyal 'gyur te// de bas 'tsho ba'i 'jig
362b5('dul ba): rten skad cig thang cig g.yo bar shes gyis la// phongs pa'i 'bras 'byin 'dod pa spongs la tsham pa'i zhi la brten par gyis// de nas bu mo rnams la mig stong ldan// dga' bas lus kyi ba spu ldang 'gyur zhing // brtson la
362b6('dul ba): mngon dga'i sems dang lhan cig gis// sum cu rtsa gsum mngon phyogs song bar gyur// de nas bu mo de rnams rab byung nyer son cing // de nyid don la rnam brtags blo mig dag gyur pas// dreg se pa'i chu rlabs g.yo zhing
363a1('dul ba): cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa dang / gos sbyin pa dang / gos byed pa dang / dge slong ma dang bcas pa'i lam dang / dge slong ma dang bcas pa'i chu 'gro ba dang / bud med dang stan gcig pa
363a2('dul ba): dang / dge slong ma dang / gnas gcig pa dang / dge slong mas nye bar sbyor du bcug pa'i zas so// zas yang yang za ba dang / 'dug gnas gcig tu lhag par za ba dang / lhung bzod do gsum las lhag par len pa
363a3('dul ba): dang / stan cig pa'i zas dang / spangs pa la stobs pa dang / 'dus shing za ba dang / dus ma yin par za ba dang / gsog 'jog za ba dang / byin len+da ma byas par za ba dang / bo sod pa blangs nas za ba'o// yang srog chags
363a4('dul ba): yod pa'i chu la spyod pa dang / nyal po byed par 'dug pa dang / der 'greng bya dang / gcer bu pa la sbyin pa dang / dmag la lte ba dang / der zhog gnyis ltos lhag par gnas pa dang / der yang bshams pa dkrugs pa
363a5('dul ba): dang / brdeg pa dang / gzas pa dang / dge slong gi ltung ba 'chab pa'o// zas gcod pa dang / maM la reg pa dang / 'dun pa phyir len pa dang / bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang / nub gnyis las lhag par nyal ba
363a6('dul ba): dang bar chad kyi chos bar du mi gcod ces zer ba dang // de dang gnas gcig tu nyal ba dang / dge tshul bsnyil sdad pa dang / kha dog ma bsgyur ba dang / gzhan gyi rin po che la reg pa dang / khrus yang yang
363b1('dul ba): byed pa'o// dud 'gro gsod pa dang / 'gyod pa bskyed pa dang / g.ya' sgog pa dang / chu la rtse ba dang / bud med dang lhan cig nyal ba dang / sngangs par byed pa dang / sbed pa dang / gdeng med par spyod pa dang / gzhi med
363b2('dul ba): phyir bskur ba dang / bud med dang 'gron lam du 'grogs pa'o// rkun ma dang 'grogs pa dang / lo ma tshang bar bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / sa rko ba dang / lhag par bdag gir byed pa dang / bslab po ston pa las phyir
363b3('dul ba): zlog pa dang / nyan rnas 'dug pa dang / mi smra bar 'gro ba dang / ma gus pa dang / chang 'thung ba dang / dus ma yin par spyod pa zhes bya'o// grong rgyu ba dang / rgyal po'i khyim du nub mo 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi 'don pa
363b4('dul ba): na rgod pas gnas pa dang / khab ral sgrub pa dang / khri rkang mthon po byed pa dang / shing bal bting ba dang / gding ba dang / g.yan pa dgab pa de nga / dbyar gyi gos ras chen gyi dang / bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos
363b5('dul ba): kyi dag go/ so sor bshags pa'i chos du yod ce na/ bzhi ste/ dge slong ma la bsod snyoms len pa dang / de zhal lta byed pa la ma bsgo bar za ba dang / khyim sdom pas bsdams pa 'dral ba dang / dgon pa 'jigs pa
363b6('dul ba): dang bcas pa'i zhes bya'o// bslab pa'i chos du zhe na/ brgya rtsa bcu gnyis te/ gang dag tsa na/ sham thabs la yang rnam bdun te/ kun nas zlum por bgo ba dang / ha cing rtsengs pa ma yin pa dang / ha cang 'jol bya
364a1('dul ba): 'jigs par byed pa yi// sdug bsngal mtsho chen mtha' med 'khor pa bu rgal bar 'gyur// 'gro ba ma rig mdongs pa kun gyi mig gcig par// rang bzhin 'gro don rnams byed nges pa'i bdag nyid kyis// /
364a2('dul ba): thub pas sems can rnams la tshul 'di gsungs pas ni// sems can rnams kyi srid pa'i tsher ma zad par shog/ gzhon nu ma bdun gyi rtogs pa brjod pa/ slob dpon gsang ba byin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// /
364a3('dul ba): dag/ slong gi lo dri ba bzhugs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ b+hik+ShA pa ra sha gr-i pr-its+tsha/ bod skad du/ dge slong gi dang po'i lo dri ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// mkhan po dgongs su gsol phyag 'tshal lo// dgung la
364a4('dul ba): bde 'am zhes dri/ chag chag dang phyag dAr dang / maN+Dal bgyi/ klog pa dang / kha to na dang / dge ba'i phyogs kyis kun tu spyad pa la chos dang mthun par bgyi/ gaN+DI'i dus su brjod par bya ba ni/ mkhan po dgongs su gsol/ phyag
364a5('dul ba): 'tshal lo// bde bar gsol lam zhes dri/ klog pa dang / kha ton bgyi/ cung zhig ngal bso zhes zhu/ mkhan po dgongs su gsol/ phyag 'tshal lo// gdugs la bde 'am zhes dri/ rkang po dag bkru/ mchil mal 'cha'/ srong dong
364a6('dul ba): tho rangs la mi nyal bar dge'i sbyor ba bgyi/ cung zhig ngal bso zhes zhu/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ phyag 'tshal lo// dgung lo bde 'am zhes dri/ chag chag dang / phyag dar dang / maN+Dal la sogs pa bgyid/ klog pa dang /
364b1('dul ba): kha ton+da bgyid/ bsam gtan bgyid// ces zhu/ gaN+DI'i dus su ni/ zas la kun tu spyad par bgyid/ zhabs la sku mnye la sogs pa bgyid/ mnyan pa dang bsam pa la sogs pa bgyid ces zhu/ de ni khyod kyi rjes su gnang
364b2('dul ba): bas so// glo bur du 'ongs pa la dri zhing lan gdab pa/ lo du lon zhe na/ lo lon pa 'am ma lon pa zhes bya bA la sogs pa brjod/ dus gang zhe na/ so ga'i dus la sogs pa'o// ci tsAm thib ce nau/ zla ba gcig gam/
364b3('dul ba): zla ba phyed dam/ zhag bcu pa la sogs pa'o// zas kyi snga rol lam zas kyi 'og rol ce na/ de bzhin du zos kyi snga rol lam zas kyi 'og rol zhi lan gdab bo// skyes bu du dang rtsa ba du zhe na/ skyes bu gcig dang rtsa ba
364b4('dul ba): gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod do// mkhan po gang yin zhe na/ don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te/ bla ma mkhan po che ge mo zhes bya'o// las byed pa'i slob ngo pon gang zhe na/ slob dpon che ga mo zhes so// gsung
364b5('dul ba): ste gsung ba ston pa'i slob dpon gang zhe na/ slob dpon che ge mo zhes so// dus du yod ce nA lnga'o// lnga po dag gang zhe na/ dgun dang / so ga dang / dbyar dang / dbyar thung ngu dang / dbyar ring po zhes bya ba'o// de la dgun gyi
364b6('dul ba): dus tshod ji tsam zhe na/ zla ba bzhi'o// bzhi po dag gang zhe na/ dgun zla ra ba dang / dgun zla 'bring po dang / dgun zla tha chung dang / dpyid zla ra ba zhes so// so ga'i dus tshad ji tsam zhe na/ zla ba bzhi'o// dpyid zla 'bring po dang /
365a1('dul ba): dpyid zla thu chung dang / dbyar zla ra ba dang / dbyar zla 'bring po dag go// dbyar gyi dus ji tsam zhe na/ zla ba gcig ste/ dbyar zla tha chung ngo // dbyar thung ngu'i dus ji tsam zhe na/ nyin zhag gcig ste/ nyin zhag
365a2('dul ba): gcig po gang yin zhe na/ ston zla ra be tshes gcig gi nyin zhag go// dpyor ring po'i tshad ji tsam zhe na// nyin zhag de nyid ma tshang ba'i zla ba gsum mo// zla ba gsum po dag gang yin zhe na/ ston zla ra ba dang / ston zla 'bring po dang
365a3('dul ba): ston zla tha chung ngo // yang smras pa/ zhag gcig ma tshang zla gsum dang // bzhi dang de bzhin bzhi po dang // zla ba gcig yin zhag gcig yin// zhes bya dus kyi lnga por brjod// sde pa gang zhe na/ 'phags pa thams cad yod par
365a4('dul ba): smra ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o// // de'i dbye ba gang zhe na/ 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yid par smra ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o// // yang sde pa du zhe na/ bzhi'o/ bzhi po gang dag ce na/ 'phags pa
365a5('dul ba): thams cad yod par smra ba dang / 'phags pa dge 'dun phal chen pa dang / 'phags pa mang pos bkur ba dang / 'phags pa gnas brtan pa'o// // de dag le dbye ba du yod ce na/ bcwo brgyad do// bco brgyad po de dag/
365a6('dul ba): ji ltar na bco brgyad du'i gyur zhe na/ 'phags pa thams cad yod par smra ba'i dbye ba bzhi'o// de bstan par bya ste/ 'od srungs zhes bya sa srung dang / chos srung ba zhes bya ba dang / gzhi kun yod por smra ba ste// lta ba'i bye brag
365b1('dul ba): 'da' zhig gis// rgyu skyes 'di dag tha dad byas// ston pa tha dad yod ma yin// dge 'dun phal chen dbye ba ni/ drug sde shar g+hi ri bo dang // de bzhin nu pU ri zhes bya dang // gang gnas pas byung la gzhan// rnam par bya sta smra
365b2('dul ba): dang // gzhan ni de bzhin btags par smra// 'jig rten 'das spyi zhes bya ba/ dag tu ni yang dag smras// / mang bas bsku ci'i bu bran no// rnam na mkhas pas bsgrogs// gos dmar ba dang skyong ba ga

366a2('dul ba): ris dang / dge 'dun lhag ma'i ris dang / ltung byed kyi ris dang / so sor bshags pa'i ris dang / bslab pa'i ris zhes bya ba'o// de la phas pham par 'gyur ba du yod ce na/ bzhi ste/ bzhi po gang dag yin zhe na/ mi tshangs pa
